question: Provide an analysis of the impact of IT spending on company revenue and net income in the technology industry.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the technology industry along with their IT budgets, revenues, and net incomes.
Correlate IT spending with revenue and net income for the identified technology companies to analyze the financial impact.
Compile the data to provide a summarized report on the relationship between IT budgets and the financial metrics (revenue and net income).
Visualize the findings in graphs or charts to illustrate the correlation between IT spending and company performance metrics.
